Inhalt: It was on a sunny day when I decided to invest in cryptocurrencies.
I had heard that you can make a lot of money with this.
So I bought some Bitcoin and Ethereum.
But a few days later, it happened:
The price crashed and I suddenly had less money than before.
I was in total panic and didn't know what I should do.
But then came the turning point:
The price suddenly rose again and I made a huge profit.
